reapack.name: MachineView.lua
reapack.desc: Hackey-Machines: An interface plugin for REAPER 5.x and up designed to mimick the machine editor in Jeskola Buzz.

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Messing with how it is indexed in reapack

version.author: : Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Ctrl + doubleclick machine opens MPL Wiredchain (relies on it already being installed!) + Alt + doubleclick opens FX window instead of just first effect + Change rename color dark theme + Added little cursor thingy for renaming machines
